overview: What do you get when two taste sensations are brought together for one unforgettable, uncensored evening? Find out when beautiful naked girls collide head-on with delicious tapioca pudding in the hottest, naughtiest, messiest wrestling match ever witnessed. Join sexy cult movie star Darian Caine, taut and tasty Molly Heartbreaker and sensual starlet Spicy J as they battle to become the Ultimate Topless Tapioca Wrestling Champion.
tagline: The ultimate in exciting all-girl wrestling!
title: Topless Tapioca Wrestling
